snippet: After a gunman’s siege in Sydney set off fears of repercussions, an effort to show solidarity with Muslims was amplified on Twitter.
abstract: Sydney residents, in show of solidarity, use Twitter hashtag to offer to ride with Muslims on trains and buses who are fearful of repercussions from attack carried out by Iranian immigrant Man Haron Monis.
lead_paragraph: After a gunman’s siege in Sydney set off fears of repercussions, an effort to show solidarity with Muslims was amplified on Twitter.

headline.main: Turning #IllRideWithYou Into Real-World Action in Australia
headline.print_headline: Gestures of Compassion Pour In on Twitter for Muslims Who Fear Bigoted Reprisals
